issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
In hadoop-2, the http server is started in the very early stage to show the progress. If the user tries to get the name system, it may not be completely up and the NN logs will have this kind of error.

{noformat}
2014-07-14 15:49:03,521 [***] WARN

We need to check this and return appropriate message back to the user.
fields.summary: nn.getNamesystem() may return NPE from JspHelper

comments.body: Moving bugs out of previously closed releases into the next minor release 2.8.0.
The new namenode UI won't hit JSPs like it used to. I don't think this problem exists anymore.
